byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman, Michael Barbaro and Patrick Healy contributed reporting.
byline.original: By NICK CORASANITI and AZAM AHMED

abstract: Donald Trump will visit Mexico, country he has repeatedly attacked, for private meeting with Pres Enrique Pena Nieto just hours before scheduled immigration speech in Arizona; meeting with Nieto, who has compared Trump to Hitler, will be Trump's first meeting with foreign head of state as Republican nominee and represents gamble for his struggling campaign.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump will make the trip on Wednesday to speak with President Enrique Peña Nieto, hours before he gives a speech on immigration.
snippet: Mr. Trump will make the trip on Wednesday to speak with President Enrique Peña Nieto, hours before he gives a speech on immigration....

headline.main: Donald Trump to Visit Mexico After More Than a Year of Mocking It
headline.print_headline: Trump to Visit Mexico to Meet With President
